name: Espato no Espaço
description:
After winning the battle of the sink, the duck became rogue and  decided to take over the galaxy. Although many years have passed, the Force Block Interstellar (FBI) was able to capture THE DUCK. Your mission is to find the rocket and escape his imprisonment on the moon. Good luck my friend!

To control the player, you can use either the W A S D or the Arrow keys.

This is a game developed in a boring/lazy sunday where we didn't have much to do because of quarantine.

We are a group of portuguese game developers that met in the global game of 2020 in Portugal. Inês Oliveira came from Viseu, the city of Viriato and studied Plastic Arts and Multimedia in the Polytechnic Institute of Viseu. João Novo came from Vila Nova de Gaia and studied Information Technology at the University of Aveiro. Madalena Barros came from Viana do Castelo and studied Game Design in the Polytechnic Institute of Bragança.  And finally, Rúben Ornelas came from Barcelos and studied Game Development at IPCA.
